prompt: Create a website for a camera selling company called ClickX
refinedPrompt: Design and develop an e-commerce website for ClickX, a camera selling company. The website should include a visually appealing homepage showcasing featured cameras and promotions, an intuitive navigation menu, product pages with detailed specifications and high-quality images, a shopping cart and secure checkout process, customer reviews and ratings, and a blog section with photography tips and tutorials. Implement a search functionality and product filtering options. The design should be modern, responsive, and optimized for mobile devices. Integrate a content management system for easy product and content updates.
